name: fh-sdk-api-test-app
description: Tests Client API with Client SDK for Cordova.

scripts.add-platform: cd test_app && cordova platform add browser &>../cordova.log
scripts.rm-platform: cd test_app && cordova platform rm browser
scripts.stop-selenium: lsof -i tcp:4444 | grep LISTEN | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill
scripts.prestart: npm run add-platform && npm run selenium
scripts.poststart: npm run stop-selenium && npm run rm-platform

author: Jan Hellar <jhellar@redhat.com>
